events.description: Jared Triolo walks.
Bryan Reynolds singles on a line drive to right fielder Cristian Pache. Jared Triolo to 3rd.
Ke'Bryan Hayes singles on a line drive to right fielder Cristian Pache. Jared Triolo scores. Bryan Reynolds to 3rd.
Connor Joe singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jake Cave, deflected by shortstop Edmundo Sosa. Bryan Reynolds scores. Ke'Bryan Hayes to 3rd.

Henry Davis grounds into a double play, second baseman Bryson Stott to shortstop Edmundo Sosa to first baseman Bryce Harper. Ke'Bryan Hayes scores. Connor Joe out at 2nd. Henry Davis out at 1st. 2 outs
